translation: In whatever way men approach Me, even so do I reward them; My path do men tread in all ways, O Arjuna.
commentary: 4.11 Ye who? Like in whatever way? Maam Me? approach? Tan them? And so? Eve even? Bhajami reward? I'm I? My My? Current path? follow follow? Humans men? Partha O Partha? Sarvashah in all ways.Commentary I reward men by bestowing upon them the objects they desire in accordance with their ways and the motives with which they seek Me.
